name: places/ChIJQQvWCedZwokROCafttEdiRk
formattedAddress: 355 Bleecker St, New York, NY 10014, USA
adrFormatAddress: 355 Bleecker St, New York, NY 10014-2679, USA

originalText.text:
I would totally recommend this experience!

I went with a group of friends to celebrate Galentines and it was such a great experience. The scents are all so yummy smelling and narrowing down to get your own scent was such a fun experience. It feels like a lab and it’s so fun to name your scent!

The staff is really cool and other people there  doing the experience are all just as joyful and fun!

I will say the scents are strong after a while you’re just smelling scents but it’s super fun!

It takes about 30 mins or so to complete your scent and I love my perfume so much!

$100 for a great experience and your signature scent that can be stored in system and create even more things like lotions and more!

originalText.text:
Was in at OLfactory earlier today and my experience was amazing. I went in with my sister and best friend and Rowen helped the three of us pick out our own custom scents.
Best part of the experience was definitely chatting with Rowen, she’s amazing at her job, knowledgeable, and very sweet.
The three of us want to go back for Mother’s Day with our moms and hopefully Rowen will be there to help us out again!

originalText.text:
Had a great experience at the Blecker street location. Booked an appointment the same day and was lucky to have Eleanor guiding my sister and I through the whole process.
She was extremely knowledgeable about the scent profiles and helped make this whole experience a stellar one.
The whole process was very interactive and a lot of fun! From customizing your own scent to picking the colored label for your bottle. Unfortunately my perfume was lost in transit back to Canada, so I’m grateful that I had all the details saved on my Olfactory account.
Thank you so much Eleanor for making this experience a memorable one!

originalText.text: Isabelle and Sidney were awesome! They gave us ample time to determine our likes and engaged in sun verbal jousting. I'm already telling people about it and plan to send the Home Experience as gifts for a couple of important clients. My own fragrance, "Buford No. 5" is a hit at the office. Thanks for an excellent experience and outstanding value proposition!

originalText.text: What an incredible experience! I had a blast designing a custom fragrance with my mom and son. Christian (at Bleecker St) was amazing! Very knowledgeable, listened to our likes/dislikes and nailed the mixes for all 3 of us right off the bat. I would highly recommend going here if you’re into perfume/fragrance!
